All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ChessBoard
The ChessBoard class; Represented by a 2d-array Piece[][], the dimension of which is defined by its constants NO_OF_ROW and NO_OF_COLUMN.
ChessController
The ChessController class; Implements the Observer class.
ChessGame
The ChessGame class; Implements Subject class.
ChessGameContainer
The ChessGameContainer class; Extends JFrame.
ChessView
The ChessView class; Implements Subject class.
Event
The Event enum; Notified by Subject, and handled by Observer.
Hourglass
The Hourglass class; Extends Piece abstract class.
Observer
The Observer interface.
Piece
The abstract class of Piece; Represents a chess piece in a game.
Piece.PieceType
The PieceType Enum; Represents a piece type of a Piece.
Player
The Player class; Represents a player in the chess game.
Plus
The Plus class ; Extends Piece abstract class.
Point
The Point class; Extends Piece abstract class.
Subject
The Subject interface.
Sun
The Sun class; Extends Piece abstract class.
Time
The Time class; Extends Piece abstract class.
